metadata.title: CVE-2014-0047 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
Docker before 1.5 allows local users to have unspecified impact via vectorsinvolving unsafe /tmp usage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0047` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.2~dfsg1-1ubuntu4~14.04.1').
